name: ddccffvv
body:
### Vim & binary files

```
:%!xxd
:%!xxd -r
```

### Flask and apache (wsgi config put the webapp in a subfolder)

To put in the sites enabled config:
```
  WSGIDaemonProcess test user=usr group=usr home="/var/www/site/directory"
  WSGIScriptAlias /path/on/site "/path/to/wsgi/file/test.wsgi"

  <Directory /var/www/site/directory/>
    WSGIProcessGroup test
    WSGIApplicationGroup %{GLOBAL}
    WSGIScriptReloading On # Automatic reload if the plugin files are changed
    WSGIPassAuthorization On # pass on http authorization to the application
    Order allow,deny
    Allow from all
  </Directory>
```

### Starting up a debian arm version on qemu

Get the image from: http://people.debian.org/~aurel32/qemu/armel/

```
qemu-system-arm -M versatilepb -kernel vmlinuz-2.6.32-5-versatile -initrd initrd.img-2.6.32-5-versatile -hda debian_squeeze_armel_standard.qcow2 -append "root=/dev/sda1" -redir tcp:5555::22
```

### Cronjobs

Setting: 

```
crontab -e
```

Format:
```
m h d m w command args
```

### HTTPS via proxy in ruby

```
  1 require "net/https"
  2 
  3 uri = URI.parse("https://www.google.be")
  4 proxy = Net::HTTP::Proxy("localhost", 8080)
  5 http_session = proxy.new(uri.host, uri.port)
  6 http_session.use_ssl = true
  7 
  8 
  9 http_session.start { |http|
 10     req = Net::HTTP::Get.new("/")
 11     resp, data = http.request(req)
 12     puts resp
 13     puts data
 14 }
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
